Description: Roughly triangular limestone stela of Sobekhotep with painted and incised Hieroglyphic texts including the cartouches of Sobekemsaf II and figured scenes on the four sides.
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM 4: Plates 18-21 PM I Part 2: p.847
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (pl.18-21)
